Conversation: Hi bartender, it's been a long day.
How have you been? Oh sorry, you can call me Isla.
We meet again after just a minute, hahaha.
You know that girl? She's very popular in this town.
HAHAHAHAHA.... I love how you decorated your bar.
So you're new here, right? Don't worry, this town always welcomes newcomers.
You'll be fine, people here are very kind.
My man, you're handsome, aren't you?
Arhhh, I heard that girl has 3 boyfriends.
You know what, she's a doctor.
Oh hey, you're back again today.
You must really like this place, huh?
Second day in town already?
Let me guess—you've met some interesting people.
So… did you sleep well last night?
This town gets quiet after dark, doesn't it?
People here talk a lot, you know.
Sometimes it's fun just listening to their stories.
Wow, this cocktail is amazing!
You really know what you're doing.
Hmm, not bad...
I've had better, but this works.
Ugh, what is this?
Sorry, I can't drink that.
